headline: Will Softer Q4 Results and EVP Exit Change PACCAR's (PCAR) Record-Profit, EV-Truck Narrative?
summary: PACCAR Inc reported fourth-quarter 2025 results showing sales of US$6,252.1 million and net income of US$556.9 million, both lower than a year earlier, while also announcing the upcoming retirement of long-serving Executive Vice President C. Michael Dozier. Despite the weaker quarter, PACCAR underscored record full-year profitability, benefits from tariff and emissions clarity, and ongoing investment in electric and autonomous truck technology. With recent returns roughly flat, we’ll examine...
